summary: This document is a Trading Authorization Agreement from TD Ameritrade, outlining the terms under which an Authorized Agent can trade on behalf of the Account Owner(s). It details the responsibilities and limitations of the Authorized Agent, as well as the rights of the Brokerage Firm and Clearing Firm. The document emphasizes compliance with regulations to prevent money laundering and terrorism funding.
keyFacts: The document is a Trading Authorization Agreement for an account with TD Ameritrade.
It allows Authorized Agents to trade on behalf of the Account Owner(s) under specified conditions.
The Agreement includes indemnity clauses protecting the Brokerage Firm and Clearing Firm from losses.
The document requires compliance with regulations to verify the identity of Authorized Agents.
No specific individuals are named in the document, but it references the roles of Account Owners and Authorized Agents.
